topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade Overview

body.p: HP Helion OpenStack(R) is a commercial-grade distribution of OpenStack(R) the leading open source cloud computing platform. This distribution, backed by HP, enables customers to more easily build, manage, and use open-source based hybrid clouds in a resilient, maintainable platform. HP Helion OpenStack(R) enables cost-effective scalability of IT services and business agility and, as part of the HP Helion portfolio, it is backed by a wide range of related cloud products, services, and professional support.

HP Helion OpenStack(R) offers many services based on the different OpenStack(R) projects to provide the functionality you need. Visit the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Services Overview page for a complete list of services.
If you're unfamiliar with what's inside the box, have a look at the components inside HP Helion OpenStack(R) on the Under the Hood page.
